mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Carousels (imageUrl, redirectUrl, isEnabled, createTime, updateTime, isDeleted) VALUES (#{imageUrl}, #{redirectUrl}, #{isEnabled}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE Carousels SET imageUrl = #{imageUrl}, redirectUrl = #{redirectUrl}, isEnabled = #{isEnabled}, updateTime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,isDeleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE Carousels SET isDeleted = true WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Carousels ORDER BY ${sortField} LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
